title: Introduction to BTTC
description: BitTorrent Chain (referred to as “BTTC” below) is the first scalable heterogeneous cross-chain interoperability protocol on TRON, featuring PoS (Proof of Stake) consensus mechanism and multi-node validation. It supports smart contract extension through sidechains and is compatible with Ethereum-based smart contracts. Together with many other functions it boasts, it enables developers to migrate and develop DApps on the chain without a hitch.

next.title: Build a Web3 App On BTTC
